video_prompt: Subtle light shifts across a futuristic city reflecting on liquid. Streaks of color pulse through the metropolis. A dark, enigmatic object slowly absorbs light from the city below, creating dynamic shadow and illumination interplay.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** Futuristic teal space city, symmetrical, glowing metropolis reflected in liquid surface below, mysterious dark object absorbing light above, ethereal cosmic glow, vibrant light streaks, intricate details, tranquil, visually striking, digital artwork.
refined_video_prompt: Subtle light shifts ripple and undulate, reflecting on liquid surfaces below. Streaks of vibrant color dynamically pulse through evolving structures. A dark presence slowly absorbs light, dramatically altering shadow patterns and illumination across all visible forms.
